section.title: Creating a Distribution
section.p: First, work your way through the pre-distribution checklist.
Build.jar can be used to create a release (applet, regular or CD). The release options are under the "..." button above the "Run" button.

section.title: Create Applet
section.p: Creates an applet distribution for embedding into a webpage. The applet is created in dist. Warning: users will be given a security popup when first running the applet.

section.title: Create Release
section.p: Packages your project and NVList files together ready for end-user distribution. The generated files are created in the releases folder. Four files are created by default:

ul.li: A zipped application bundle for Mac OSX

section.title: Create CD Release
section.p: Creates a disk image (.iso) ready to burn onto a CD/DVD. If correctly set up in installer-config.ini, a Windows Java runtime and Java installer will be included on the CD. If these aren't included, Windows users lacking a modern Java runtime can't run the installer.

section.title: Adding Files to a Distribution
section.p: All game resources must be stored in the res folder. These files will be packed into a .nvl file upon distribution. To add end user readable files to a distribution, place them in the build-res/extra-dist-files folder. Any files/folders stored there will be included in distributions in the game root folder as regular files.
